member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit File Export Data Check.CheckDataToExport(Audit File Export Header@):Enum::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit Data Check Status
member.summary: Checks all records and fields that will be used for exporting of the selected audit file export document to the corresponding audit file export format.
member.returns: The status of the data check - Passed or Failed.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit File Export Data Check.CheckAuditDocReadyToExport(Audit File Export Header@):Enum::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit Data Check Status
member.summary: Checks if the selected audit file export document is ready for exporting, for example if all required fields are filled.
member.returns: The status of the data check - Passed or Failed.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit File Export Data Handling.LoadStandardAccounts(Enum::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Standard Account Type):Boolean
member.summary: Loads list of standard general ledger accounts to Standard Account table.
member.returns: true if all G/L accounts were uploaded.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit File Export Data Handling.CreateAuditFileExportLines(Audit File Export Header@)
member.summary: Creates lines for the selected audit file export document.
member.param: Header of a document for which lines are created.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit File Export Data Handling.GenerateFileContentForAuditFileExportLine(Audit File Export Line@,Codeunit::System#Utilities#Temp Blob@)
member.summary: Generates audit file content for the selected audit file export line.
member.param: Audit export line for which file content is generated.
Generated file content must be returned as TempBlob.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit File Export Data Handling.GetFileNameForAuditFileExportLine(Audit File Export Line@):Text[1024]
member.summary: Creates a string which will be used as a file name when an audit file is created from the audit file export line.
member.param: Audit export line for which file name is created.
member.returns: A string with full file name like abc.txt or SIE.se.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Audit File Export Data Handling.InitAuditExportDataTypeSetup
member.summary: Removes the existing records and create new default records in the Audit Export Data Type Setup table.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Import Audit Data Mgt#.ImportStandardAccountsFromXMLBuffer(XML Buffer@,Enum::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Standard Account Type)
member.summary: Fills Standard Account table from temporary XML Buffer table.
member.param: Standard account type for which standard account records are created.
member.remarks: XML Buffer must contain 2 child nodes for each buffer record. The 1st node holds Standard Account No.; 2nd - Standard Account Description".

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Import Audit Data Mgt#.ImportStandardAccountsWithGroupingCodesFromXMLBuffer(XML Buffer@,Enum::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Standard Account Type)
member.summary: Fills Standard Account table from temporary XML Buffer table.
member.param: Standard account type for which standard account records are created.
member.remarks: XML Buffer must contain 3 child nodes for each buffer record. The 1st node holds Standard Account Category No.; 2nd - Standard Account No.; 3rd - Standard Account Description".

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Import Audit Data Mgt#.ImportStandardAccountsFromCSVBuffer(CSV Buffer@,Enum::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Standard Account Type)
member.summary: Fills Standard Account table from temporary CSV Buffer table.
member.param: Standard account type for which standard account records are created.
member.remarks: CSV Buffer must contain at least 2 fields for each line. The 1st field holds Standard Account No.; 2nd - Standard Account Description; 3rd - Standard Account Category (optional)".

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Finance#AuditFileExport#Import Audit Data Mgt#.LoadStandardAccountsFromCSVTextToCSVBuffer(CSV Buffer@,Text,Text[1])
member.summary: Parses CSV document content and saves it into the temporary CSV Buffer table.
member.param: CSV text in a format "Standard Account No.; Standard Account Description; Standard Account Category" or "Standard Account No.; Standard Account Description"
Separator which is used to divide values within a CSV line.
